mCoordToGeoCoord

public static Coordinates mCoordToGeoCoord(double x,
                                           double y)
Conversion from local coordinates (relative to HOME) in meters to geographic coordinates. WARNING : Not accurate ! Based on a simple conversion from meters to miles !

Parameters:
x - x local coordinate (East)
y - y local coordinate (North)
Returns:
the corresponding geographic coordinates
